title: A Children's Playground of Lettering
content:
This is such a lovely site. I just want to share this link with you. Have fun with it.

[http://www.cecilia-letteringart.com/children/childrengallery.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021221853/http:/www.cecilia-letteringart.com/children/childrengallery.htm "http://www.cecilia-letteringart.com/children/childrengallery.htm")

Bye: Steven
author: stw

comments.content:
This one is so cute! And the A is really intelligent. (13 years old)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021221853im_/http:/typophile.com/files/childrens%20playground%20-%20michael.jpg)
  
And Laura could become a new great de stijl artist. (11 years old)  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021221853im_/http:/typophile.com/files/childrens%20playground%20-%20laura.jpg)
  
:-)
